original: Brodin, Hans Wilhelm Germund, advokat, Linköping, f. 20/3/02 i Malmö av borgmäst. Hians B. o. Helma Dy-berg. G. 29 m. Carin Thiman. Barn: Susanne f. 34, Marie 39, Ehsabeth 41, Theodora 42. — Stud :ex. i Malmö 20, jur. kand. i Lund 25. Res. t. Tyskl. 21, Österr. 24 o. 25, Ital. 36. E. o. not. i Göta hovr., tingstjg. i Lrnköp. 28-29, däreft. adv. i Linköp., deläg. i Linköp. Jur. Byrå. Led. av stadsrev., suppl. i landstinget, ordf. i Gammalkils distr. tax:nd. Medl. av Sv:es adv:samif., Frimurarorden o. SHT. Hobbies: segHng, musik.
translated: Brodin, Hans Wilhelm Germund, lawyer, from Linköping. Born March 20th, 1902 in Malmö to the mayor Hians B. and Helma Dy-berg. Married in 1929 to Carin Thiman. Children: Susanne born in 1934, Marie in 1939, Ehsabeth in 1941, Theodora in 1942. He took his studentexamen (high school diploma) in Malmö in 1920 and earned his law degree from Lund University in 1925. He traveled to Germany in 1921, Austria in 1924 and 1925, and Italy in 1936. He worked as a notary in the Göta Court of Appeal and as a court clerk in Linköping from 1928-1929, then became a lawyer in Linköping and a co-owner of a law firm. He was a member of the city council, a substitute member of the county council, the chairman of the Gammalkils district tax committee, a member of the Swedish Bar Association, the Freemasons, and SHT. His hobbies were sailing and music.

significantEvents.name: Appointed chairman of Gammalkils district tax committee
